lead_paragraph: Defensive end Auston English could miss the next two games for No. 6 Oklahoma after spraining his left knee. Coach Bob Stoops said English could be out “maybe three weeks.” The Sooners (8-1, 4-1 Big 12) play at Texas A&M this week, then host No. 2 Texas Tech on Nov. 22. English has 4 ½ sacks and 27 tackles in nine games.
